so again thank you for your time and

they play a very important role and the

we can harness this healing potential
that exists inside every single one of
us and utilize it to overcome disease or

have over inflammation or damaged tissue
and the the good news is that we have a
large amount of stem cells that are
lying in storage inside our fat tissue
so I like to refer to it as America's

enough stem cells here in America
because the fact is our our most

very easy clinical procedure we can take
a small sample of fat tissue isolate the

in your knee so we could inject the stem
cell
directly into your knee to help overcome

necessarily have to know exactly what is

MS spinal cord injuries we can apply it

and damaged tissue so keeping that in

and so the challenge is when the
technology is inside you the cells are
inside you there is nothing for

something that pharmaceutical companies
would be against because there's no

the stem cells and we inject those so
approximately a year ago I received a

America and the lawsuit read the United

and our clinic as well and what it
stated is that this
stem cells inside your body are a drug
